Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item not only boasts high-quality materials but also features innovative technology that promises unparalleled performance and durability. Given its unique blend of quality and functionality, we believe it's truly worth more than its face value. Considering its market value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $180. This price reflects the true worth of the product and the opportunity to own something special at a competitive rate. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to provide you with an outstanding experience. If you have any questions or need further information, please feel free to ask. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
